src:
【Klook優惠碼】即日起至11月10日每晚11時搶買一送一優惠（內附優惠碼）
01 Nov 2019, 11:41 by 理財
【Klook優惠碼】Klook的感謝月是11月，配合「雙11」的購物狂熱及成立5周年紀念。Klook推出「買買買感謝祭」優惠活動，多項旅遊產品及服務享有折扣優惠。由即日起至11月10日，每晚11時更會推出限量「買一送一」產品優惠碼，日日新款！撰文：Smart ED編輯部  ｜ 圖片：Klook
Klook旅遊優惠碼



Klook 新推出「買買買感謝祭」活動，由即日起至11月31日，凡經Klook平台購買旅遊產品及服務滿HK$800，並輸入優惠碼「THANKYOU1111」，即可減HK$88。新用戶經Klook平台購買旅遊產品及服務滿HK$300，輸入優惠碼「NEWTHANKYOU」，即可減HK$35。優惠受條款及細則約束。Klook亦推出「買一送一」限時搶購優惠。由即日起至11月10日，每晚11時Klook 平台都會推出限時優惠，包括成田機場接送 Skyliner京成電鐵往返東京市區（單程）車票，香港海洋公園門票、台北101觀景台門票等。而11月11及12日，Klook更推出連續12小時「買一送一」優惠，將限時優惠擴至早上11時至晚上11時，一連兩日連續12小時盡情搶優惠，先到先得，搶完即止。優惠受條款及細則約束。



優惠日期


限時搶購優惠



11月1 日

大阪南海電鐵車票（單程）



11月2日

成田機場接送 Skyliner京成電鐵往返東京市區（單程）



11月3日

台北101觀景台門票



11月4日

香港SuperPark室內樂園門票



11月5日

香港海洋公園1日門票



11月6日

【美食盛宴】澳門銀河群芳自助餐 (週末午間自助餐）



11月7日

【名廚都匯】澳門JW萬豪酒店自助餐 (週末午餐）



11月8日
【限時優惠】愛寶樂園 Everland 1日門票（掃 QR Code 直接入場）


11月9日

南怡島 & 春川小王子村一日遊 – 首爾出發



11月10日

香港迪士尼樂園1日門票



自助餐優惠碼
另外，Klook推出香港澳門自助餐優惠，由即日起11月30日，經Klook平台購買指定香港及澳門酒店自助餐滿HK$1,000，輸入優惠碼「BUFFETTHZ」，即可減HK$200。（優惠受條款及細則約束。）指定香港及澳門酒店包括：香港海洋公園萬豪酒店Marina Kitchen、香港W酒店KITCHEN、香港萬麗海景酒店Café Renaissance、澳門JW萬豪酒店、澳門巴黎人Le Buffet等。延伸閱讀：【雙11淘寶2019】Taobao天貓網購 用呢6張信用卡賺最多！
亞洲旅遊優惠
Klook除了推出多項亞洲旅遊優惠，還有歐洲及澳洲優惠，包括Eurail歐鐵全境火車證85折起、德國鐵路火車證  （連續及彈性3/4日）9折，以及歐洲旅遊活動低至半價等。Klook亦推出指定Wi-Fi分享器及指定YSIM優惠：包括租用指定（日/韓/台）Wi-Fi分享器享首日HK$1/日優惠；購買指定YSIM（泰國柬埔寨/澳洲/新西蘭/日本）享有8折優惠。

【理財解碼】滙豐突加紅簿仔息 平均年息1.1厘 3個月最多可賺2,750元息

text:
[Klook Coupon Code] From now until November 10, at 11:00 every night, buy one get one free offer (with coupon code)
01 Nov 2019, 11:41 by financial management
[Klook Coupon Code] Klook's thank you month is November, in conjunction with the "Double 11" shopping fanaticism and the 5th anniversary of its establishment. Klook launched the "Buy Buy and Buy Thanks" offer, which offers discounts on a variety of travel products and services. From now until November 10, a limited edition "buy one get one free" product coupon code will be launched at 11 o'clock every night. Written by: Smart ED Editorial | Photo: Klook
Klook Travel Coupon Code



Klook has launched the "Buy and Buy Thanks Festival" event. From now until November 31, you can reduce HK$88 by purchasing the travel products and services over HK$800 via Klook platform and entering the coupon code "THANKYOU1111". New users who purchase travel products and services via Klook platform for HK$300 can enter HK$35 with coupon code "NEWTHANKYOU". Offer is subject to terms and conditions. Klook also launched a "buy one get one free" limited time offer. From now until November 10, the Klook platform will launch a limited time offer at 11:00 every night, including Narita Airport shuttle Skyliner Keisei Electric Railway to and from Tokyo City (one way) tickets, Hong Kong Ocean Park tickets, Taipei 101 viewing platform tickets. On November 11 and 12, Klook launched a 12-hour "Buy One Get One Free" offer to extend the limited time offer from 11am to 11pm for 12 consecutive hours for two consecutive days, first come first served. While the stock is over. Offer is subject to terms and conditions.



Offer date


Limited time offer



November 1st

Osaka Nankai Electric Railway Ticket (one way)



November 2

Narita Airport Transfer Skyliner Keisei Electric Railway to and from Tokyo City (one way)



November 3

Taipei 101 Observation Deck Tickets



November 4th

Hong Kong SuperPark Indoor Park Tickets



November 5th

Hong Kong Ocean Park 1 Day Ticket



November 6

[Gourmet Feast] Macau Galaxy Qunfang Buffet (Weekend Lunch Buffet)



November 7

[Celebrity Chefs Meeting] JW Marriott Hotel Macau Buffet (Weekend Lunch)



November 8
[Limited Time Offer] Everland 1st Day Ticket (Sweep QR Code Direct Admission)


November 9

Nami Island & Chuncheon Little Prince Village Day Tour – Departure from Seoul



November 10

Hong Kong Disneyland 1 Day Ticket



Buffet coupon code
In addition, Klook launched the Hong Kong Macau Buffet Promotion. From now on, on November 30th, the Klook platform will purchase HK$1,000 for designated Hong Kong and Macau hotel buffets. Enter coupon code "BUFFETTHZ" to reduce HK$200. (Offers are subject to terms and conditions.) Designated hotels in Hong Kong and Macau include: Marina Kitchen, Hong Kong W Hotels KITCHEN, Hong Kong Renaissance Café, Hong Kong JW Marriott Hotel, Macau Parisian Le Buffet and more. Extended reading: [Double 11 Taobao 2019] Taobao Tmall online shopping to use 6 credit cards to earn the most!
Asia Travel Offers
In addition to a number of Asian travel offers, Klook also offers European and Australian offers, including a 15% discount on Eurail's all-terrain train certificates, a 10% discount on German train trains (continuous and flexible 3/4 days), and a half-price in Europe. Klook also launched a designated Wi-Fi sharing device and designated YSIM offers: including rental designated (Japanese/Korean/Taiwan) Wi-Fi sharing device for the first day of HK$1/day discount; purchase of designated YSIM (Thailand Cambodia/Australia/New Zealand/Japan) ) Enjoy a 20% discount.
